function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Selection of a site near an open surface water body increasing the number of breeding sites for the malaria vector","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading malaria due to expanded vector breeding sites","Mitigation":"Choose building sites away from open surface water bodies to reduce vector breeding sites","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis tools for site selection","People":"Design teams, project managers","Owner":"Design teams, project managers"},{"Description":"Placement and size of building openings affecting vector accessibility","Impact":"Increased risk of vector entry and exit leading to potential malaria transmission","Mitigation":"Careful placement and sizing of building openings to limit vector accessibility","Technologies":"Architectural design software for optimizing building openings","People":"Architects, designers, project managers","Owner":"Design teams, project managers"},{"Description":"Use of materials that increase vector attraction into the site","Impact":"Higher risk of vector presence within the building site, increasing potential for malaria transmission","Mitigation":"Selection of materials that discourage vector attraction and presence","Technologies":"Material analysis software for evaluating vector-attracting materials","People":"Architects, construction managers","Owner":"Design teams, construction managers"}]}
